ygData.subject: Song mix ?
ygData.msgSnippet: As in the pat when I feel I ve hit a brick wall I turn to this list to give me a boost. So here is my new qurey: I just made 30th level, Up to now I ve been
ygData.messageBody:
As in the pat when I feel I've hit a brick wall I turn to this list to give me a boost. So here is my new qurey:
I just made 30th level, Up to now I've been singing Anthem & Psalm of Warmth, with Pixie, Charm and Chains thrown in when needed. For down time I play( with lute) Hymn. I always keep Selos mem'd with Screech for a fast getaway. so there are my 8 song slots. I weild weapons most of the time Kirsh & Obs. Shard in off hand.
Now I'm 30 I got my first Chant...but last nite I was at a loss as how to weave it into my mix, do I do all instruments? do i sing it as a 3rd or 4th song what song do I drop? Most of the time I fight in High Keep or Karnuk so AoE aggro is not a problem.
Please help me :-)

Pinen
bard of the rathe 30 songs ( and took too long to get 'em)
GM-Noble Warriors of Norrath


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
